title: Role-based Authentication Success
description: Verify users can authenticate successfully with valid credentials and their assigned roles are enforced across modules.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username and password for Admin role
Submit login form
Verify login succeeds and user is redirected to Admin dashboard
Log out
Input valid username and password for Attendant role
Submit login form
Verify login succeeds and user has permission to perform package registration and incident logging
Log out
Input valid username and password for Resident role
Submit login form
Verify login succeeds and user has read-only access to notices, packages, documents, and booking features

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that users cannot access modules or perform actions outside of their role permissions.

steps.description: Login as Resident
Attempt to access Admin dashboard or perform administrative actions
Access is denied or buttons/features are disabled/invisible
Login as Attendant
Attempt to manage users or change system-wide settings
Access is denied or features not available

title: Dashboard KPI Display Accuracy
description: Verify that the dashboard displays real-time operational metrics accurately and updates without page reload.

steps.description: Login as Admin and navigate to dashboard
Verify occupancy rates, pending packages, and maintenance incidents metrics are displayed
Simulate package entry and maintenance incident logged by another user
Verify dashboard updates metrics in real-time without page refresh

title: Portal de Avisos Priority and Real-time Sync
description: Check creation, prioritization, color coding, and instant sync of community notices among users.

steps.description: Login as Attendant and create notices with low, medium, and high priority
Verify notices display correct color codes based on priority
Confirm notices appear instantly in Resident view without refreshing the page

title: Package Management Workflow
description: Test package registration with photo capture, storage verification, and timestamped retrieval logging.

steps.description: Login as Attendant and register a new package with photo capture
Verify photo is stored in Supabase storage and associated with the package record
Retrieve package as Attendant and log the retrieval with timestamp
Verify retrieval log is created with accurate timestamp and user attribution

title: Package Management Error Handling
description: Validate error handling when photo upload fails during package registration or retrieval logging.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or storage service outage during photo upload
Attempt to register a package with photo capture
Verify user is notified of upload failure and package is not registered
Attempt to log package retrieval when storage service is unavailable
Verify error is handled gracefully and logged appropriately

title: Incident Logging and Audit Trail
description: Validate incident creation, categorization, immutable history, and user attribution with audit logs.

steps.description: Login as Attendant and open Di√°rio de Bordo
Log a new maintenance incident with proper categorization
Verify incident is attributed to the logged-in user and timestamped
Attempt to edit or delete existing incident entries
Verify history is immutable and audit trail remains intact

title: Booking Calendar Workflow
description: Test the booking request creation, admin approval workflow, and status confirmation updates.

steps.description: Login as Resident and request a booking for a common area
Verify booking appears in calendar as pending
Login as Admin and approve the booking
Verify booking status updates to confirmed and Resident view updates in real-time
Attempt booking conflict by overlapping another booking for same time and space
Verify system prevents double bookings with an error message

title: Unit and Floor Management Data Integrity
description: Check unit and floor explorer displays complete information with responsible personnel and occupancy map accuracy.

steps.description: Access Salas module as Admin
Verify all units and floors display correct assigned personnel and contact info
Verify visual occupancy map reflects current occupancy accurately
Modify unit occupancy status and personnel details
Verify changes are saved and reflected in UI and dashboard KPIs

title: Document Repository Upload and Access Control
description: Validate upload of various file types, categorized organization and role-based access permissions for document retrieval.

steps.description: Login as Admin and upload categorized document files (pdf, docx, images)
Verify files are uploaded and stored correctly in Supabase Storage
Set access permissions for uploaded documents based on user roles
Login as Resident and attempt to access permitted and non-permitted documents
Verify Resident can only access authorized documents and unauthorized access is denied

title: Vendor Directory Management and Status Update
description: Check creation, updating, evaluation, and status management of vendor and service provider entries.

steps.description: Login as Admin and add new vendor record with details
Verify vendor is listed in directory with correct status and details
Update vendor status (active/inactive) and add service evaluation
Verify updates are saved and displayed accurately
Login as Resident and view vendor directory
Verify only active vendors and evaluations are visible

title: Real-time Data Synchronization Across Modules
description: Ensure all modules update their displays and data in real-time without requiring page reloads.

steps.description: Login as multiple users simultaneously (Admin, Attendant, Resident)
Perform actions such as package registration, incident logging, notice creation, and booking approvals by one user
Verify all other users see the updates reflected immediately in their views without manual refresh

title: Audit Logs Integrity Verification
description: Verify audit logs capture all critical user actions with correct timestamps and user identification, ensuring legal security compliance.

steps.description: Perform various actions including package registration, incident creation, booking approval as different roles
Check audit logs for accurate records of these actions with timestamps and user details
Attempt to modify or delete audit logs
Verify audit logs are immutable and modifications are not permitted
